traffic3.objects

Class TrafficArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • traffic3.objects.TrafficArea

  • public class TrafficArea
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps an Area object with some extra information.

        Returns:
        All movement-blocking lines.
